AI Description: py-mpi4py is a Python interface to the Message Passing Interface (MPI) standard for parallel computing, allowing users to utilize MPI functionality within Python scripts and applications.
Core Features:
1. Provides Python bindings for the MPI standard, enabling parallel computing within Python.
2. Supports point-to-point communication, collective operations, and one-sided communication.
3. Facilitates process management, dynamic process creation, and inter-process communication.
4. Enables parallel execution of code across multiple processors or nodes in a cluster.
